name: Errand Voodoo
body:
# Errand Voodoo

Your voodoo mentor needs "ingredients". How efficient can you be?
# Installation Instructions:

1. Unzip
2. Start ErrandVoodoo.exe
3. Play
Notes:
- Fullscreen breaks the game
- Resolutions under 1280x720 are not supported
- Only 16:9 aspect ratio resolutions work

# Credits:

Game Design - Vic Thor
Graphics - Riikka 'Medusa' Vasko 
Lead programmer & Music - Juho 'bradur' Saarelainen
Programmer - Matias 'M2tias' Pitkänen
 

# Platforms:

MS Windows
# Tools and Technologies:

Unity (any product)
